review: It does what it's suppose to do, easy installation, everything was easy.  The product description failed to mentioned that it contained a USB Power cable so I ended up ordering one separately. Not a big expense but it would have been a nice to know.
author: john n

review: Great product, provides great entertainment when friends/family are over allowing us all to queue up youtube videos.  The only issue i take with it is that when not pushing youtube video and using other apps(pandora, screencasting, etc) from my phone the cast icon will usually only show up after either a reboot of the chromecast or my router.  I also had to change a setting on my router to get it to work at all, which I was able to find after a quick google search.  I have found that this happens on all our android phones in the house.  I am unsure if this issues is with the device or the router but I am hoping that an update to the chromecast will eventually resolve the issue.  The router in questions is a DIR-655.
